reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: The establishment and operation of Al-Jarmah Health Center in Hiran in Hajjah Governorate

description.narrative: Providing medical services for (18000) finding integrated health services in the Directorate of Hiran

Rehabilitation of the building and its medical and non-medical treatment Provide integrated health care services, therapeutic feeding and immunization services, reproductive health services, injury treatment, referral system, surveillance system and epidemiology with awareness and health education for the displaced and reduce their suffering

To save lives and maintain their continuity and reduce the spread of diseases and epidemics and to provide basic health and nutrition services and reproductive health and support the health sector of the Directorate of Hiran in Hajjah.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
